sections.title: Arcane Savant (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Arcane Savant class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Adept Activation (Ex) (Arcane Savant)
sections.description: Allows taking 10 on Use Magic Device checks (except when activating blindly) and prevents automatic failure on natural 1s.

sections.title: Master Scholar (Ex) (Arcane Savant)
sections.description: Adds half class level as bonus to Knowledge (arcana), Spellcraft, and Use Magic Device checks, and allows taking 10 on Knowledge (arcana) and Spellcraft even when distracted.

sections.title: Esoteric Magic (Ex) (Arcane Savant)
sections.description: Allows choosing spells from any class list and adding them to base spellcasting class, potentially at one level higher if normally unavailable.

sections.title: Glyph-Finding (Ex) (Arcane Savant)
sections.description: Allows using Spellcraft to find writing-based magical traps like glyphs, runes, sigils, and symbols.

sections.title: Scroll Master (Su) (Arcane Savant)
sections.description: Allows using own caster level instead of item's caster level when using scrolls or spell-completion items.

sections.title: Quick Identification (Sp) (Arcane Savant)
sections.description: Can use identify as a swift action once per day per 2 class levels at character level caster level.

sections.title: Sigil Master (Su) (Arcane Savant)
sections.description: Provides class level bonus on saves against writing-based magical traps and prevents triggering them on successful saves.

sections.title: Analyze Dweomer (Sp) (Arcane Savant)
sections.description: Can use analyze dweomer for up to 1 round per class level per day in 1-round increments.

sections.title: Silence Master (Su) (Arcane Savant)
sections.description: Can activate magic items silently using gestures and cast spells as if using silent metamagic rod three times per day.

sections.title: Dispelling Master (Su) (Arcane Savant)
sections.description: Can spontaneously convert prepared spells into dispel magic or add dispel spells to known list, healing when successfully dispelling.

sections.title: Symbol Master (Su) (Arcane Savant)
sections.description: Increases symbol spell DCs by 2, can double sigil master bonus as immediate action, and never automatically fails symbol saves on natural 1.

sections.title: Spellcasting Master (Ex) (Arcane Savant)
sections.description: Can focus as swift action to cast spells without provoking attacks of opportunity and extend concentration spell duration.

sections.title: Item Master (Su) (Arcane Savant)
sections.description: Can attune to one non-charged magic item per hour ritual, allowing it to use the arcane savant's caster level instead of its own.
